snippet.title: Official Kizi Adventures (iOS / Android) Gameplay Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Kizi Adventures by Funtomic (2008) LTD (iOS / Android)

Kizi is now on the app store!

Kizi's spaceship has been captured! Guide Kizi through this amazing adventure as Kizi jumps, stomps and glides across mysterious worlds, searching for missing parts of his ship.

Kizi Adventures is an instant hit featuring your favorite friend Kizi, an experience that will keep you entertained for hours!

A Galaxy to explore
Help Kizi through exciting levels filled with fun puzzles and rewarding bonuses. Can you find all the hidden rooms in each level?

YOU are the Champion
Complete various tasks and challenges throughout the game and win trophies!

Be a hero
Help Kizi Stomp, Freeze and Smash a variety of minions, before taking on the big boss himself!

Join Kizi on his greatest adventure yet!

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/kizi-adventures/id849702990

Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.funtomic.kiziadventures

Homepage:

http://funtomic.com/kizi

Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/Funtomic

Twitter:

https://twitter.com/FuntomicGames
